text: Are we able to create <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/drag-and-drop-areas/sections#section-templates|section templates> via the design manager? In the design manager, I chose New File > HTML + HubL > Template Partial > Standard Partial and then added my code to the .html file. I’m seeing the following errors in the console.
I didn’t see an option to select a template type of ‘section’ when creating a new file, so I chose ‘template partial’
AFAIK sections must be made via local development. Marketers can make their own saved sections in the page editor tool, but those are capped at a certain number.
Thanks, Mark. I’ll go the CLI route. I know that works!
